name: Hiking Trails III
description: An essential guide to Strathcona Park and the trails of north Vancouver Island. With routes for new or experienced hikers, this book has lots of details, 78 colour maps, and colour photos to prepare you for your adventure. Covers a huge area of the island: Great Central Lake to Cape Scott, plus Hornby, Quadra, Malcolm, and Nootka islands. Updated and revised with new trails and info.
